title: APOS Theory-Based Educational Design for Least Squares Estimation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic statistical concepts (mean, variance), linear functions, and experience with simple operations
context.additional_context: Hands-on practice using tablets/laptops in a BYOD environment, emphasizing case-based learning tailored to managerial roles

learning_goals: Explain the concept of least squares estimation by applying the four stages of APOS theory (Action → Process → Object → Schema)
Convert statistical uncertainty problems into algebraic expressions and interpret their geometric meanings
Build a least squares regression model using real-world business data and apply it to project reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
